title: White House, Congress praise long-delayed first SLS launch
summary: The inaugural flight of the Space Launch System won positive reactions from the White House and Congress, celebrating the successful liftoff while overlooking the vehicle’s extensive delays.

title: NASA Awards Extension for Space, Earth Science Data Analysis Contract
summary: NASA has awarded a six-month extension to ADNET Systems Inc. of Bethesda, Maryland, for the Space and Earth Science Data Analysis (SESDA IV) contract.

title: AST SpaceMobile searching for funds to accelerate constellation
summary: A year and a half after netting around $417 million through its IPO, AST SpaceMobile is seeking more funds to accelerate a direct-to-smartphone constellation that has fallen behind a key regulatory deadline.

title: NASA Awards Contract for Liquid Helium Acquisition at Kennedy
summary: NASA has selected Air Products and Chemicals, Inc of Allentown, Pennsylvania, to supply 33 million liters of liquid helium to the agency’s Kennedy Space Center in Florida.

title: Europe reaches funding deal for sovereign broadband constellation
summary: The European Union reached a provisional agreement Nov. 17 to cover nearly half the 6 billion euro ($6.2 billion) cost of deploying a secure connectivity constellation by 2027.
